job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and potentially integrating new functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models through feedback and participation in fine-tuning, which is a core task in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies falls under the research and experimentation aspect of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system to enhance customer service, fitting the definition of integrating AI features into applications.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems, which aligns with the 'Learning & Adaptability' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, fitting the 'Problem Solving & Pragmatism' category.

profile.rationale: The role focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI models through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's an element of model improvement (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on applying and integrating AI to enhance an existing application (customer support), rather than developing AI models from scratch or specializing purely in GenAI tasks. The tasks are predominantly in Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration) with supporting tasks in AI Specialization, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. While it mentions AI model fine-tuning, the overall framing suggests a role that leverages and enhances existing AI systems rather than deep AI research or development. The soft skills are also clearly implied. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the 'AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions' could be interpreted with slightly more depth in AI model improvement than explicitly stated.
